name: Nickado Avocado: The Game :)
description:
This Is MY Nickado Avocado Game That I Made Cause Yeah.

Anyways, Story:

Nickado Avocado Was Going Through The Drivethrough Of Popeyes, But The "EVIL" Broccoli Gang Broke Into His Car &  Started Attacking Him. Hopefully He Ordered His New And Improved Chicken Sandwich & Now He Has The ABILITY To Shoot Infinite Supplies Of Chicken Sandwiches!!!!11!!!1!!!!1!

-Arrow Keys To Move

-Space To Shoot Chicken Sandwiches

-Avoid Getting Hit By The Broccoli Gang

Credits:

Mario Crying Art By The Guy Who Made It

Crash Bandicoot Music In The Title Screen

WEEGEEPIE For The Audio Intro

Food Png Files :)

Mario's Power-Down Sound

GIMP For Chroma Keying The Popsicles

& Last But Not Least...

NICKADO AVOCADO!!!!!!11!!1!!!!1!!11!!1!

Download It NOW!! It's FREE!!

I Hope U Like It :)
